explanation: [0-0] In a living room, there is a TV on the wall showing a girl with two braids wearing a black dress. In front of the TV is a man wearing a green short-sleeved shirt, holding a flower in his left hand and extending a finger of his right hand in front of his mouth.

[0-8] Then the man touches the girl on the TV with the finger of his right hand. The girl turns around in fear. Then the man kneels down on one knee with a smile, raises the flower in his hand to the TV, and makes a flying kiss gesture. Finally, the girl on the TV smiles, and the man makes a gesture of celebration.
